About Me

BIO

I am a first-year Software Engineering student at the University of Turku (M.Sc.). Through my studies, my passion for coding has awakened. I enjoy especially web programming and frontend development projects. My interest in web development is also reflected in my Bachelor's thesis, in which I wrote about the accessibility of websites. In the future, my goal is to become a professional in the software industry and develop my coding skills.
